an3.147:4.1: “Someone with three qualities is cast down to hell.
an3.147:4.3: Blameworthy deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.147:4.4: Someone with these three qualities is cast down to hell.
an3.147:5.1: Someone with three qualities is raised up to heaven.
an3.147:5.3: Blameless deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.147:5.4: Someone with these three qualities is raised up to heaven.”
